thread.title: Ezekiel Elliott's Friend Alvarez Jackson Arrested for Carrying Gun at Ohio Club
thread.title_full: Ezekiel Elliott's Friend Alvarez Jackson Arrested for Carrying Gun at Ohio Club

author: Mike Chiari
title: Ezekiel Elliott's Friend Alvarez Jackson Arrested for Carrying Gun at Ohio Club

organizations.name: jackson arrested for carrying gun at ohio club jim

text: Ezekiel Elliott's Friend Alvarez Jackson Arrested for Carrying Gun at Ohio Club Jim McIsaac/Getty Images Mike Chiari Featured Columnist February 22, 2017 Dallas Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott's friend Alvarez Jackson was arrested Feb. 17 for carrying a loaded gun into a Columbus, Ohio, bar. According to TMZ Sports , Elliott was not arrested or detained, but he did speak to police regarding the incident, as seen in the following video: Per Kate Hairopoulos of the Dallas Morning News , police confirmed that Elliott wasn't suspected or accused of any wrongdoing. According to Matt Lombardo of NJ.com, TMZ originally reported that Elliott was detained then questioned. The Pro Bowler denied the report in a since-deleted tweet, however: "I was never 'detained' by the police. Nor was I ever questioned or in any type of trouble." Jackson was charged with felony illegal gun possession in a liquor establishment and is set to appear in court Wednesday, per TMZ Sports . Like the new article format? !
